publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2295.1 John Lamont: Pringle of Scotland Job Lossesâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-2295) in the name of Jim Hume, insert at end "further regrets the premature comments from Jim Hume MSP earlier this year when he may have given false hope to many of the Hawick workforce by stating in the local press that the firm had committed to stay in the town and that he "would be working with them in the future to this end", and calls on the Scottish Government to take action to prevent textiles firms from using the "Made in Scotland" label and other such Scottish branding inappropriately." Supported by: Jackson Carlaw*, Mary Scanlon*, Murdo Fraser*, Jamie McGrigor*, Bill Aitken*, Margaret Mitchell*
S3M-2295.1 Pringle of Scotland Job Losses (lodged on 2 July 2008) Nanette Milne*
S3M-2295.1 Pringle of Scotland Job Losses (lodged on 2 July 2008) Ted Brocklebank*
